title: Skin Sathi
subtitle: AI Skin Disease Detector & E-commerce App
description: Building an AI Skin detection system and an E-commerce application for selling medicines, an AI chat-bot and a doctor meeting scheduling system.
longDescription: Skin Sathi is a comprehensive mobile application that combines AI-powered skin disease detection with e-commerce functionality. The app uses MobileNetV3 model for accurate skin condition diagnosis and provides users with the ability to purchase recommended medicines directly through the integrated e-commerce platform.
features: AI-powered skin disease detection using MobileNetV3

title: IHC Pharmacy
subtitle: Pharmacy Management System
description: Built a management system for IHC Pharmacy which can create invoices, manage products, users, and provide daily, monthly, annual analysis of sales.
longDescription: A comprehensive pharmacy management system with React frontend and Express + PostgreSQL backend. The system streamlines pharmacy operations including inventory management, invoice generation, and comprehensive sales analytics.
features: Daily, monthly, and annual sales analytics

title: HRMS Portal
subtitle: Human Resource Management System
description: Developed HRMS features during internship including employee claims, notifications, validations, and Winston logging.
longDescription: A professional HRMS system built with Angular frontend and NestJS backend. Developed comprehensive features for managing employee claims, notifications, and system logging during my internship at Intellicore Tech.

title: Rasterex Web Viewer
subtitle: Annotation & PDF Viewer Enhancements
description: Contributed to feature development and bug fixing in JavaScript-based Rasterex Viewer. Optimized PDF object handling, annotation scaling, and rotation fixes.
longDescription: Enhanced the Rasterex Web Viewer with optimized annotation features and improved PDF handling. Focused on fixing critical bugs related to scaling, rotation, and memory management.

title: MedPro
subtitle: Online Medical Store & Pharmacy App
description: Developing a full-featured online medical store with user and admin panels for medicine sales, order management, and inventory control.
longDescription: MedPro is a scalable online medical store built as a mobile-first application. It allows users to browse medicines, place orders, and track deliveries, while providing admins with complete control over inventory, orders, and users. The project focuses on clean architecture, modular backend APIs, and a smooth user experience.
features: Browse and search medicines by category

title: Unified Visual Programming Language (VPL)
subtitle: Visual Programming Framework for Code Generation
description: Extended a visual programming framework to generate C++ code using drag-and-drop visual components.
longDescription: This project extends the unified-vpl-framework to make programming more visual and accessible. It introduces new visual components like buttons, inputs, text areas, and layouts, enabling users to visually design logic and automatically generate C++ code instead of Python.
features: Custom UI components (buttons, inputs, text areas)
Web-based editor for beginners and non-programmers

title: Catch Alpha Game
subtitle: Assembly Language Based COAL Game
description: Developed a COAL assembly language game where the player catches falling alphabets using keyboard controls.
longDescription: Catch Alpha is a low-level game developed using COAL (Computer Organization & Assembly Language). The game focuses on core assembly concepts such as registers, interrupts, memory handling, and keyboard input. Players control a catcher to catch falling alphabets, improving reflexes while demonstrating mastery of assembly-level programming.

title: Art Gallery Management System
subtitle: Online Art Exhibition & Management Platform
description: Developed a web-based art gallery system for managing artworks, artists, exhibitions, and user interactions.
longDescription: An art gallery management system that allows admins to manage artists, artworks, and exhibitions while enabling users to explore galleries and view artwork details. The project focuses on clean UI design and structured backend development.

title: GoVista
subtitle: Tour Booking & Travel Management Platform
description: Developed a web-based tour booking application that allows users to explore destinations, book tours, and interact with an AI-powered travel chatbot.
longDescription: GoVista is a full-stack travel and tourism web application designed to simplify tour discovery and booking. The platform enables users to browse tour packages, view destination details, and make bookings through an intuitive interface. An integrated LLM-powered chatbot assists users by answering travel-related queries, suggesting destinations, and providing booking guidance.

title: Password Strength Checker
subtitle: Entropy-Based Password Security Analyzer
description: Built a password strength evaluation system using entropy analysis, rule-based checks, and breach detection to classify password security.
longDescription: The Password Strength Checker is a security-focused web application that evaluates user passwords using a multi-factor scoring pipeline. It combines mathematical entropy calculation, character diversity analysis, dictionary matching, human predictability detection, and breach verification via the HaveIBeenPwned API. The system provides a normalized score (0â€“100) and classifies passwords into five security levels for clear user feedback.
features: Rule-based scoring with length and character diversity
